Installation Guide¶

Prerequisites¶

  • PHP 8.0 or higher

  • Composer

  • A web server (e.g., Apache or Nginx)

Steps¶

  1. Clone the repository:

    git clone https://github.com/Mustafa-KH-Hamad/Api-master-class
cd your-laravel-repo
